DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the absorption rate of four oral formulations of vabicaserin.
DOC.brief_title: Study Comparing Bioavailability of Oral Formulations of Vabicaserin
DOC.criteria: Healthy men aged 1850 years. Any significant disease state. History of drug or alcohol abuse within 1 year. Abnormal liver function tests.
